channel.title: How do I make an object (when clicked) do something? (Ex; Tele) [317, PI!]
channel.description:
How do I go about making an object, when it is clicked, teleport you, give you an item, or change your height and such?
Basically, where is this found? (What folder, and what should I search for while inside the folder?)
New to coding, sorry for the stupid question:) Couldn't seem to find it in all these classes.
